Package shape

Class _03Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • shape._03Shape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<_03Shape>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    _04Cylinder, _05Cone, _06Pyramid, _07Prism
    public abstract class _03Shape
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<_03Shape>
    Abstract class representing a geometric shape with a height. Subclasses must implement methods to calculate base area and volume. Implements Comparable interface to compare shapes based on height.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(_03Shape other)
        Compares the height of a Shape with the height of another Shape for ordering.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<_03Shape>
        Parameters:
        other - The other height of the shape to compare.
        Returns:
        A negative integer, zero, or a positive integer indicating whether the height of this shape is less than, equal to, or greater than the height of the other shape, respectively.
